name: Marketing - Cover & Post Safe Zones - Social Media
description:
Social Media Cheat Sheet - Don't you hate it when your text goes behind your profile pic?


This free Figma template should help you with some instances where social assets have exclusion areas. This template is also a great help if you just want to copy the correct artboard sizes.


Look, with the number of sizes and updates, this is not the one file to rule them all... But I think it's a good start, and I hope it brings you heaps of joy. <3


Please request updates if you have any :)
